name: Caspio Mobile App - Page Loading & Refresh Issues

userStories.title: Reduce Category/Room Page Load Times (Zero Data Loss)
userStories.description: Loading category or room pages shows loading screen EVERY TIME page opens. User navigates in/out many times per report causing major delays. Using IndexedDB with Dexie liveQuery wrapper. Images are rolled up (lazy load on expand) so should NOT cause load delays. CRITICAL: Cannot lose live updates, data, or images. Every IndexedDB change should update cache to retain loaded info.
acceptanceCriteria: No loading screen on return visits to cached pages
Pages load instantly when data already in IndexedDB
ALL images display correctly when expanded
technicalContext: IndexedDB with Dexie wrapper has liveQuery for reactive updates
Need cache strategy that returns cached data instantly
Updates cache on every IndexedDB change
Never blocks UI for data already loaded

userStories.title: Hard Refreshes - 'Preparing Template' Screen (NOT FIXED - REINTRODUCED)
userStories.description: CRITICAL - NOT FIXED. Hard refreshes show 'Preparing Template' screen. Was fixed in previous GitHub solution but issue reintroduced. SUSPECTED ROOT CAUSES: (1) Page flag being marked false causing reload, (2) 5-minute cache TTL expiring triggers full page refresh instead of background update.
acceptanceCriteria: No hard refreshes during any normal operation
No 'Preparing Template' screen after initial load
App remains stable throughout user session
Root cause identified and permanently resolved
investigationSteps: Check page dirty flags being reset incorrectly
Check 5-minute cache TTL triggering full refresh
Review previous GitHub fix that resolved this
